3 namespace Ubiquity\orm\parser;

5 use mindplay\annotations\Annotations;
6 use Ubiquity\orm\OrmUtils;

15 class Reflexion extends ReflexionFieldsTrait {
16 
17  public static function getMethods($instance, $filter = null) {
18  $reflect = new \ReflectionClass ( $instance );
19  $methods = $reflect->getMethods ( $filter );
20  return $methods;
21  }
22 
23  public static function getKeyFields($instance) {
24  return self::getMembersNameWithAnnotation ( get_class ( $instance ), "@id" );
25  }
26 
27  public static function getMemberValue($instance, $member) {
28  $prop = self::getProperty ( $instance, $member );
29  $prop->setAccessible ( true );
30  return $prop->getValue ( $instance );
31  }
32 
33  public static function getPropValue($instance, $prop) {
34  return $prop->getValue ( $instance );
35  }
36 
37  public static function setMemberValue($instance, $member, $value) {
38  $prop = self::getProperty ( $instance, $member );
39  if ($prop) {
40  $prop->setAccessible ( true );
41  $prop->setValue ( $instance, $value );
42  return true;
43  }
44  return false;
45  }
46 
47  public static function getPropertiesAndValues($instance, $props = NULL) {
48  $ret = array ();
49  $className = get_class ( $instance );
50  if (is_null ( $props ))
51  $props = self::getProperties ( $instance );
52  foreach ( $props as $prop ) {
53  $prop->setAccessible ( true );
54  $v = $prop->getValue ( $instance );
55  if (OrmUtils::isSerializable ( $className, $prop->getName () )) {
56  if (OrmUtils::isNotNullOrNullAccepted ( $v, $className, $prop->getName () )) {
57  $name = OrmUtils::getFieldName ( $className, $prop->getName () );
58  $ret [$name] = $v;
59  }
60  }
61  }
62  return $ret;
63  }
64 
65  public static function getAnnotationClass($class, $annotation) {
66  $annot = Annotations::ofClass ( $class, $annotation );
67  return $annot;
68  }
69 
70  public static function getAnnotationMember($class, $member, $annotation) {
71  $annot = Annotations::ofProperty ( $class, $member, $annotation );
72  return current ( $annot );
73  }
74 
75  public static function getAnnotationsMember($class, $member, $annotation) {
76  return Annotations::ofProperty ( $class, $member, $annotation );
77  }
78 
79  public static function getAnnotationsMethod($class, $method, $annotation) {
80  if (is_array ( $annotation )) {
81  $result = [ ];
82  foreach ( $annotation as $annot ) {
83  $annots = Annotations::ofMethod ( $class, $method, $annot );
84  if (sizeof ( $annots ) > 0) {
85  $result = array_merge ( $result, $annots );
86  }
87  }
88  return $result;
89  }
90  $annots = Annotations::ofMethod ( $class, $method, $annotation );
91  if (\sizeof ( $annots ) > 0)
92  return $annots;
93  return false;
94  }
95 
96  public static function getMembersAnnotationWithAnnotation($class, $annotation) {
97  return self::getMembersWithAnnotation_ ( $class, $annotation, function (&$ret, $prop, $annot) {
98  $ret [$prop->getName ()] = $annot;
99  } );
100  }
101 
102  public static function getMembersWithAnnotation($class, $annotation) {
103  return self::getMembersWithAnnotation_ ( $class, $annotation, function (&$ret, $prop) {
104  $ret [] = $prop;
105  } );
106  }
107 
108  public static function getMembersNameWithAnnotation($class, $annotation) {
109  return self::getMembersWithAnnotation_ ( $class, $annotation, function (&$ret, $prop) {
110  $ret [] = $prop->getName ();
111  } );
112  }
113 
114  protected static function getMembersWithAnnotation_($class, $annotation, $callback) {
115  $props = self::getProperties ( $class );
116  $ret = array ();
117  foreach ( $props as $prop ) {
118  $annot = self::getAnnotationMember ( $class, $prop->getName (), $annotation );
119  if ($annot !== false)
120  $callback ( $ret, $prop, $annot );
121  }
122  return $ret;
123  }
124 
125  public static function getTableName($class) {
126  $ret = Reflexion::getAnnotationClass ( $class, "@table" );
127  if (\sizeof ( $ret ) === 0) {
128  $posSlash = strrpos ( $class, '\\' );
129  if ($posSlash !== false)
130  $class = substr ( $class, $posSlash + 1 );
131  $ret = $class;
132  } else {
133  $ret = $ret [0]->name;
134  }
135  return $ret;
136  }
137 
138  public static function getMethodParameters(\ReflectionFunctionAbstract $method) {
139  $result = array ();
140  foreach ( $method->getParameters () as $param ) {
141  $result [] = $param->name;
142  }
143  return $result;
144  }
145 
146  public static function getJoinTables($class) {
147  $result = [ ];
148  $annots = self::getMembersAnnotationWithAnnotation ( $class, "@joinTable" );
149  foreach ( $annots as $annot ) {
150  $result [] = $annot->name;
151  }
152  return $result;
153  }
154 
155  public static function getAllJoinTables($models) {
156  $result = [ ];
157  foreach ( $models as $model ) {
158  $result = array_merge ( $result, self::getJoinTables ( $model ) );
159  }
160  return $result;
161  }
162 }
